content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace (no furnace found at this location)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper plate factory
No copper plate factory found

### Lab
Consists of lab at position (no position found)

### Chests
Consists of following entities
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Chest at position(x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)
-  Chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)
-  Chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extract_item function
-  Ensure that the item to be extracted has a 'value' attribute before calling extract_item function
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities to be connected are not nil before calling connect_entities function
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure that the chest is not full before using burner inserter to insert items into the chest
### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has enough fuel before using it to mine resources
### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace has enough ingredients to smelt before using it to smelt items
### Errors when using pipe group
-  Ensure that the pipe group is not a list before calling pipe_group.pipes
### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler
-  Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler are connected before using them to generate steam
### Errors when using chest
-  Ensure that the chest is not full before inserting items into it
-  Ensure that the chest has enough space to hold the items before inserting them into the chest
